labels.analysis: The IPMA Weather Data Server primarily provides real-time and historical weather data specifically for Portugal. Its core functionality revolves around accessing meteorological information, including forecasts, warnings, and observational data. The available tools enable users to retrieve weather forecasts for specific cities, check active weather warnings, access seismic data, list available locations, view data from weather stations, and obtain UV forecasts. This server is designed for applications that require reliable weather data for forecasting, analysis, and decision-making.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "Weather" is chosen because the server's core functionality is centered around providing weather-related data (forecasts, warnings, UV index, etc.). The secondary label "Geospatial Data" is selected because the server also provides location-based weather information and seismic data, which can be used for geospatial analysis. The secondary label "Data Analysis & Processing" is included because the server allows for the retrieval and processing of meteorological data, which can be used for further analysis. No custom label is needed as the predefined categories adequately cover the server's functionality.

tools.name: get_weather_forecast
tools.description: Obter previsão meteorológica para uma cidade específica em Portugal

city.description: Nome da cidade (ex: Lisboa, Porto, Coimbra, Faro, etc.)

tools.name: get_weather_warnings
tools.description: Obter avisos meteorológicos ativos em Portugal

tools.name: get_locations
tools.description: Listar todas as cidades/locais disponíveis para previsão

tools.name: get_weather_stations
tools.description: Obter dados de observação das estações meteorológicas

server_info_crawled.name: IPMA Weather Data Server
server_info_crawled.author: @brandao-20/mcp_server_ipma
server_info_crawled.overview: Provide real-time and historical weather data from the Portuguese Institute for Sea and Atmosphere (IPMA) to your applications. Enable seamless access to meteorological information for forecasting, analysis, and decision-making. Integrate reliable weather data effortlessly through standardized MCP endpoints.

tools.name: get_weather_forecast
tools.description: Obter previsão meteorológica para uma cidade específica em Portugal

city.description: Nome da cidade (ex: Lisboa, Porto, Coimbra, Faro, etc.)

tools.name: get_weather_warnings
tools.description: Obter avisos meteorológicos ativos em Portugal

tools.name: get_weather_stations
tools.description: Obter dados de observação das estações meteorológicas

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@brandao-20/mcp_server_ipma/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
